para.caption: Anonymous SVN
para.text: We now offer an anonymous svn access. Check it out with: svn co svn://php3.de/xp

para.caption: Web based SVN
para.text:
For convenience, we have set up a Web based SVN viewer, so you can easily inspect the files.
Point your browser to http://svn.xp-framework.net to see it.
(Note: we once used to use CVS and offered a web based CVS viewer. These services have been shut down since the migration which took place in May 2005).
